Title: Toy Story 3
Overview: Woody, Buzz, and the rest of Andy's toys haven't been played with in years. With Andy about to go to college, the gang find themselves accidentally left at a nefarious day care center. The toys must band together to escape and return home to Andy.
Keywords: hostage, college, toy, barbie, animation, escape, day care, teddy bear, duringcreditsstinger, toy comes to life, personification, inanimate objects coming to life, toy story
production_companies: Walt Disney Pictures, Pixar Animation Studios
Cast: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Ned Beatty
